MefProductRelationship.description: Linked products to the one instantiate, such as [bundled] if the product is a bundle and you want to describe the bundled products inside this bundle; [reliesOn] if the product needs another already owned product to rely on (e.g. an option on an already owned mobile access product) [targets] or [isTargeted] (depending on the way of expressing the link) for any other kind of links that may be useful

href.description: Hyperlink to the product in Seller's inventory that is referenced Hyperlink MAY be used when providing response by the Seller Hyperlink MUST be ignored by the Seller in case it is provided by the Buyer in a request

groupingKey.description: Related Product Identifier list is constructed from product ids having the same groupingKey and relationshipType.
